name: vui.rocks
description: The most lightweight, performant, and powerful front-end framework for faster and easier Mobile UI Development.

scripts.prod: node-sass --include-path scss scss/vui.scss css/vui.min.css --output-style compressed & node-sass --include-path scss scss/vui.scss css/vui.css --output-style

author: Grujoski Blagojche
